definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Russian ethnic group (of northeast China and Xinjiang etc)/Russian nationality/Russians (of Russia)

sentences.english: Russia says that Iran and North Korea do not have missiles capable of striking Europe.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯說，伊朗和北韓沒有掌握可以打擊歐洲的導彈。

sentences.english: Russia, a major oil producer, is unlikely to embrace any ambitious emissions reductions.
sentences.chinese: 產油大國俄羅斯不太可能歡迎任何大幅減排計劃。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲和俄羅斯佔本年度菸草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: It was bound for the Russian Republic of Dagestan in the North Caucasus.
sentences.chinese: 該飛機飛往北高加索地區的達吉斯坦俄羅斯共和國。

sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯長久以來都渴望讓西方國家遠離他的後院。

sentences.english: Mr Zorin says this kind of social engineering is the key to understanding today's problem.
sentences.chinese: 佐林指出這種社會工程是理解俄羅斯現有問題的關鍵。

sentences.english: The Russian official assessed that Pyongyang was "hunkering down for a succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯官員認爲朝鮮會堅守繼承的傳統。

sentences.english: Now Russia, for at least the second time, has fired on a Chinese civilian ship.
sentences.chinese: 現在俄羅斯，至少第二次，解僱了在中國民用船。

sentences.english: Before bed, standing in the wood-rich hall of the Russian Hill house, she counted her cash.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺前，她站在俄羅斯風格房子的木客廳，算錢。

sentences.english: Mongolia and Russia, based on the use of Cyrillic alphabet text.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄羅斯境內的使用斯拉夫字母爲基礎的文字。

sentences.english: Russian cuisine is famous for its soups such as borscht and meat dishes.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯菜以它的各種湯和葷菜著名於世。

sentences.english: But the cosmodrome is just a start for Russia's new space ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 但航天器發射場只是俄羅斯新的空間雄心的開始。

sentences.english: The agreement still requires ratification from the full Senate and the Russian Duma.
sentences.chinese: 該協議仍然需要參議院全體議員和俄羅斯杜馬的批准。

sentences.english: She would like it signed on a Russian sable coat.
sentences.chinese: 她想讓他把名字簽在一件俄羅斯的紫貂皮大衣上。

sentences.english: Chinese Ambassador to Russia Li Hui also greeted Hu at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 中國駐俄羅斯大使李輝也到機場迎接。

sentences.english: Another advantage in Russia is consistency, Bulcke said.
sentences.chinese: 薄凱說，俄羅斯的另外一個優勢是政策的一致性。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]
South Korea (Republic of Korea)/Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄[zhan4 guo2 qi1 xiong2]/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
